page.title: 09Gargrave, Tourism 1.
page.content: Gargrave attracts many tourists. Some come on foot via{The Pennine Way,}Some bring{caravans}to stay at either the New Brighton site, or the Eshton Road site where{tents}are also allowed. {Refreshment}and{meals}only are available at The Mason's Arms, whilst there is also{accommodation}at The Old Swan and The Anchor. Kirk Syke guest house also offers accommodation, and there are a number of holiday homes to let in the village. {Cruisers}on the Leeds and Liverpool Canal often stop in the village to explore, for refreshment, and to top up their stores from the shops.
